select id, code, name, sex, `type`, contact, phone, email, status, images, create_date, audit_date, remark, price, user_id from user_info where 1 = 1
AND type = #{storeRecordInfo.type}
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.name},'%')
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.code},'%')
order by create_date desc
